docs.snippet: President Donald Trump on Saturday defended his embattled head of the Environmental Protection Agency, Scott Pruitt, and said the official's travel and security expenses were reasonable.

headline.main: Trump Stands by Embattled EPA Chief Pruitt in Tweet
headline.print_headline: Trump Stands by Embattled EPA Chief Pruitt in Tweet

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump and leader Raul Castro will attend the Summit of the Americas next week in Peru.

headline.main: Trump and Raul Castro Will Attend Summit of the Americas
headline.print_headline: Trump and Raul Castro Will Attend Summit of the Americas

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump has spoken: He wants U.S. troops and civilians out of Syria by the fall. But don't call it a "timeline."

headline.main: Trump Wants Out of Syria, but Don't Say 'Timeline'
headline.print_headline: Trump Wants Out of Syria, but Don't Say 'Timeline'

docs.snippet: The Latest on President Trump and his Environmental Protection Agency chief, Scott Pruitt (all times local):

headline.main: The Latest: Pruitt Fights for Job in Meeting With Trump
headline.print_headline: The Latest: Pruitt Fights for Job in Meeting With Trump

docs.snippet: Embattled Environmental Protection Agency administrator Scott Pruitt met with President Donald Trump on Friday to lay out his case for why he should remain in his post amid a stream of questions about his ethical standing.

headline.main: EPA Head Fights for His Job in Meeting With Trump
headline.print_headline: EPA Head Fights for His Job in Meeting With Trump

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump has spoken: He wants U.S. troops and civilians out of Syria by the fall. But don't call it a "timeline."

headline.main: Trump Wants Out of Syria, but Don't Say 'Timeline'
headline.print_headline: Trump Wants Out of Syria, but Don't Say 'Timeline'

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump plans to skip the White House Correspondents' Association dinner, marking the second year he has shunned the glitzy gathering of Washington journalists he routinely assails as "fake news."

headline.main: Trump to Skip Annual White House Correspondents' Dinner
headline.print_headline: Trump to Skip Annual White House Correspondents' Dinner

docs.snippet: Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto on Thursday delivered a sharp rebuke to Donald Trump over the U.S. leader's plan to send National Guard troops to the border, urging him not to thrust Mexico into U.S. domestic politics.

headline.main: Mexican President Slams Trump Over Border Plan
headline.print_headline: Mexican President Slams Trump Over Border Plan

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump will be attending another dinner held by a super PAC.

headline.main: Trump Attending Another Super PAC Dinner
headline.print_headline: Trump Attending Another Super PAC Dinner

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump is remembering the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. on the 50th anniversary of the civil rights leader's assassination.

headline.main: Trump Tweets Video Clip of Remarks in Praise of King
headline.print_headline: Trump Tweets Video Clip of Remarks in Praise of King
